Event.Maindescription:
SIS Monthly Sahasranamam (February)

Events

3.00 p.m : Vishnu Sahasranamam
3.20 p.m : Lalitha Sahasranamam
3:40 p.m : Bhajans
4:00 p.m : Spiritual Talk
4:15 p.m : Aarathi and Prasadam

Please RSVP by 3rd February

We request volunteers to host the next Sahasranamam that will be on the 3rd of March
